summary: Increased diversity for Skyrim's child population! Adds new children and child races to the game, while tweaking the existing child races to make them look and feel more like their adult counterparts. No more will you mistake every child in the game for every other (and fail to realise that they're not all nords).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][color=#ffff00][u]Installation via the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.[/u][/color][/b][/color] Installing the mod via the NMM will make the mod automatically (or manually) compatible with other mods.

[color=#a2c4c9][b][font=Georgia][size=4]Installation Instructions[/size][/font][/b][/color]

TBA

[font=Georgia][color=#d0e0e3][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#d0e0e3][size=3][i]TK Children[/i][/size][/color][/font] Compatibility[/size][/color][/font]

Don't.
author: DeeP6
